overview: Award winning Director Michael Raven helms this action packed thriller starring Julia Ann. Nominated for 11 AVN Awards, he artfully tells the story of a scorned women hell bent on revenge. Her quest to avenge her husbands murder demands her most cunning and vicious moves, but when you have Killer Sex & Suicides Blondes on your side, you're sure to be a winner.
title: Killer Sex and Suicide Blondes
